Edges-Summoner -- Female Human Heroic Summoner
Attributes (10 Points):
Agility: d6 Smarts: d12 Spirit: d8 Strength: d6 Vigor: d8
Skills (20 Points):
Alchemy: (sma) d4 Fighting: (agi) d4 Riding: (agi) d6
Athletics: (agi) d6 Notice: (sma) d4 Spellcasting: (sma) d12
Battle: (sma) d4 Occult: (sma) d6 Stealth: (agi) d4
Boating: (agi) d6 Persuasion: (spi) d4 Taunt: (sma) d4
Common Knowledge: (sma) d4 Repair: (sma) d4
Faith: (spi) d4 Research: (sma) d6
Size: 0
Advances: 12 Improvement Points: 28 Improvement Points Allocation: Attribute: 10; Edge: 10; Skill: 8
Features
Edges (6 points): Arcane Background (Summoner); Arcane Barding; Ferocious Summoning; Great Summoning; New Powers; Power Points Hindrances: Greedy; Illiterate; Obligation; Poverty Human Features: Adaptable
Feature Notes:
Adaptable: +1 Edge Points
Arcane Background (Summoner): Has Armor Interference and Master Summoner features
Greedy: Demands more than a fair share
Illiterate: Cannot read or write
Obligation: Has regular responsibility that occupies 20 hr/wk
Poverty: Starts with half funds, loses half funds each wk
Combat
Parry: 4 (0) Cover: 0 Toughness: 7 (1) Pace/Run: 6/+d6
Armor: Robe With Hooded Cloak Shield: None Weapons: Bolas (d6+d4 R3"); Repeating Hand Crossbow (2d4 R5"); Sap (d6+d4); Unarmed (d6+d0)
Combat Notes:
Fighting Parry Modifier: +2 Parry
Vigor Toughness Modifier: +4
Arcana
Power Count: 7 Power Points: 20
Powers:
Summon Animal: (Special PP) R12" Brings chosen animal type to perform task for 5 rd (+1 PP Increased Trait; +1 PP Self can use animal's senses; Epic +Half PP Additional animals)
Summon Monster: (Special PP) R12" Brings chosen monster type to perform task for 5 rd (+1 PP Increased Trait; +1 PP Self can use monster's senses; Epic +Half PP Additional monsters)
Common Power Modifiers: +1/+2/+3 PP Armor Piercing; +2 PP Fatigue; +1 PP Glow/Shroud; +2 PP Heavy Weapon; +1 PP Hinder/Hurry; +2 PP Lingering Damage; +1/+2 PP Dbl/Tpl Range; +1 PP Selective
Arcana Notes:
Arcane Background (Summoner): 5 Powers/15 Power Points
New Powers: +2 Power Count
Power Points: +5 Power Points
Arcane Barding: Summoned animals gain +2 Toughness
Armor Interference: -4 arcane skill rolls and cannot use arcane edge features in medium or heavy armor
Ferocious Summoning: May grant summoned monsters 1 combat edge
Great Summoning: May spend 5/7/8/8/11 PP to summon barghest/mammoth/frost mammoth/tyrannosaurus rex/young dragon
Master Summoner: Reduces cost of Summon Ally/Animal/Monster by 2 PP (minimum 1 PP) and increases duration by 10x
